sentence.Network_en: Although the car is basically sound, I was worried about certain areas.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管这辆汽车基本状况良好，我还是担心一些地方不够安全。

sentence.Network_en: If the examination shows your company enjoys basically good health, read on.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是审查表明你们公司的运营状况基本良好，请继续往下读。

sentence.Network_en: She was basically fenced in by what the military wanted to do.
sentence.Network_cn: 军旅事务使她基本上无法脱身。

entry.def: You use basically for emphasis when you are stating an opinion, or when you are making an important statement about something.

example.ex: This gun is designed for one purpose—it's basically to kill people...
example.tran: 这种枪只有一个用途——就是用来杀人。

example.ex: Basically I think he would be someone who complemented me in terms of character.
example.tran: 我基本上认为他是在性格上和我互补的人。

entry.tran: 大致说来；从根本上来讲
entry.def: You use basically to show that you are describing a situation in a simple, general way, and that you are not concerned with less important details.

example.tran: 大致说来，你有两个选择。
从根本上来讲，这是严格的素食主义饮食。

means.word_mean: 1. at bottom or by one's (or its) very nature;

sentences.sentence: "the argument was essentially a technical one"
"for all his bluster he is in essence a shy person"

stems_affixes.word_buile: basic基本的+ally……地→adv.基本上,主要地
synthetic合成的+ally……地→adv.综合地,合成地
systematic系统的,体系的+ally……地→adv.系统地,有规则地

Sentence.sentence: Second, Americans have basically decided that they don't really want to produce all their own oil.
For students, it means they're basically stuck with a four pound paper-weight that they can't sell back.
Well, just, I can only remember basically what I said before.
I basically skipped my senior year," says Sergent.
Do you still believe people are basically good?
Part of the problem is that it is basically incomprehensible," says Blofeld, one of the settlement's most vocal British critics.

sentences.en: Basically I agree with your plan.
sentences.cn: 我基本上同意你的计划。

jushi.english: Basically I agree with your plan.
jushi.chinese: 基本上我同意你的计划。

jushi.english: Basically did all he could to clean up on his critics.
jushi.chinese: 从根本上说,他总是千方百计打击批评他的人。
